Package om.question

Core question interface: the lowest level which all Om questions must implement.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Question Basic low-level interface that all questions must implement.
 

Class Summary
ActionParams Parameters provided when the user makes an action (e.g.
ActionRendering Extra data needed for action responses
CustomResult Custom question result (ignored by test navigator system but may be used in custom interpretation of results).
InitParams Parameters that are passed to a question when it is being initialised.
Rendering Information a Question provides in order that it may be rendered as XHTML for the user's browser.
Resource Represents a resource file provided by a question
Results Question results (scores)
Score Single score
 

Package om.question Description

Core question interface: the lowest level which all Om questions must implement. This does not include the XML format or components or anything like that (those are in stdquestion), just a basic interface.

Covered in document: OM-S design draft.doc
